_instructions: Add this node to WF00 and connect 'Log to Notion' -> 'Trigger Auto-Debugger' (parallel with existing 'Check If Critical' connection)

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ workflow_id: $json.workflow_id, workflow_name: $json.workflow_name, execution_id: $json.execution_id, execution_url: $json.execution_url, error_message: $json.error_message, error_stack: $json.error_stack, node_name: $json.node_name, severity: $json.severity, timestamp: $json.timestamp }) }}

newConnection._note: Log to Notion should now connect to BOTH 'Check If Critical' AND 'Trigger Auto-Debugger'
